item.title: [pi] yell command
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

p0sesed s0ul:

Change Connected to Connection, sorry, but seriously, you could have fixed that on your own, if you looked at the start of the command, there’s if (!Connection.isMutes© so obviously, you are supposed to be Connection not Connected…

Yeah I didn’t look at the error, fixed it like 5 seconds after I posted it.

item.title: [pi] yell command
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“p0sesed s0ul, post:4, topic:407012”][code]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

                                                   if (!Connection.isMuted(c)) {
                                                    if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 1){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Moderator]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 2){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Administrator]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                    }else if (c.playerRights == 0){
                                                            c2.sendMessage("<col=2763519>[Player]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                            + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                                   
                                                   		}
                                                    } else if (Connected.isMuted(c)) {
		c.sendMessage("You cannot yell whilst muted!");
		return;
		}
                                            }
                                    }
                            }
   
   
}

[/code]

Try that, post back any errors yeah?

EDIT: Also if you don’t have it, at the top of commands.java add this import with the others

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:163: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable Connected
location: class server.model.players.packets.Commands
} else if (Connected.isM
uted©) {
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: [pi] yell command

item.description:
@p0sesed_s0ul wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
                                for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
                                        if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
                                                Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
                                               
                                                       if (!Connection.isMuted(c)) {
                                                        if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
                                                                c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                        }else if (c.playerRights == 1){
                                                                c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Moderator]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                        }else if (c.playerRights == 2){
                                                                c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Administrator]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                        }else if (c.playerRights == 3){
                                                                c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                        }else if (c.playerRights == 0){
                                                                c2.sendMessage("<col=2763519>[Player]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
                                                                                                + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
                                                                       
                                                       		}
                                                        } else if (Connected.isMuted(c)) {
			c.sendMessage("You cannot yell whilst muted!");
			return;
			}
                                                }
                                        }
                                }
       
       
    }

item.title: [pi] yell command
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

Hey guys, right now people can yell when they’re muted, can anyone fix this? [code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Moderator]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Administrator]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 0){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=2763519>[Player]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								
						
						}
					}
				}
			}
    
    
}[/code]
